TopicTitle: Target-related speed value still displayed on in-cockpit displays after docking

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 1.3.1.1891, Windows 64-bit, updated via Steam

What Happens: Target-related speed value on displays in cockpit didn't disappear after docking. Orbital speed becomes displayed over this value.

Mods / Add-Ons: No mods, "GameData" folder has been cleaned (except "Squad" subfolder)

Steps to Replicate:

1. Run "Docking" tutorial.

2. Set "Target" as current point of reference.

3. Switch to cockpit-inside view.

4. Dock with ship.

Result:

Before docking:

 

After docking:
